mapper.select: select bId, bName, bTitle, bContent, bDate, bHit, bGroup, bStep, bIndent from wmk_mvc_board order by bGroup desc, bStep asc
mapper.update: update wmk_mvc_board set bStep = bStep + 1 where bGroup = #{bGroup} and bStep > #{bStep}
mapper.insert: insert into wmk_mvc_board (bId, bName, bTitle, bContent, bGroup, bStep, bIndent) values (mvc_board_seq.nextval, #{bName}, #{bTitle},#{bContent}, #{bGroup}, #{bStep}+1, #{bIndent}+1)
insert into wmk_mvc_board (bId, bName, bTitle, bContent, bHit, bGroup, bStep, bIndent) values (mvc_board_seq.nextval, #{bName}, #{bTitle}, #{bContent}, 0, mvc_board_seq.currval, 0, 0)
update wmk_mvc_board set bName = #{bName}, bTitle = #{bTitle}, bContent = #{bContent} where bId = #{bId}
update wmk_mvc_board set bHit = bHit + 1 where bId = #{bId}
